text: Perecesi Torna Klub was a Hungarian football club from Pereces, district of Miskolc. ==History== Perecesi Torna Klub debuted in the 1946–47 season of the Hungarian League and finished ninth. == Name Changes == *1923–1949: Perecesi TK *1949–1951: Perecesi Tárna TK *1951–1957: Perecesi Bányász SK *1957–1958: Perecesi TK *1958–1959: Perecesi Bányász *1959–1975: Miskolci Bányász == References == ==External links== * Profile Category:Football clubs in Hungary Category:Defunct football clubs in Hungary Category:1923 establishments in Hungary Category:Mining association football clubs in Hungary
title: Perecesi TK
